description: Fragrant, a little bit spicy and ready in just 30 minutes, this quick chicken pho recipe is the perfect dish to warm you up on cooler nights.
name: Chicken Pho Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide noodles between serving bowls. Top with chicken. Ladle stock mixture into bowls. Top with bean shoots, herbs, shallot, onion and chilli.
Divide noodles between serving bowls. Top with chicken. Ladle stock mixture into bowls. Top with bean shoots, herbs, shallot, onion and chilli.
